nodes.text: Sword Squadron was a starfighter squadron composed of members of the New Jedi Order during the Second Imperial Civil War. They flew X-83 TwinTails.

It was initially formed by Jedi Master Te Corso to aid in the evacuation of Dac after the planet was globally poisoned by the One Sith. The squadron would aid in both the space and aspects of the operation, driving out local Imperial forces and coordinating evacuation procedure. Drok, a member of the squadron, assisted members of Rogue Squadron in infiltrating the Mon Calamari Shipyards and sabotaging its defenses in preparation for the operation.
